TSLA.invalidation_condition: If price closes below $452.00 on a 3-minute candle
TSLA.entry_justification: Price above EMA20, MACD positive at 1.43, intraday pullback to support near $456. Strong volume and 4h uptrend support long with 2:1 R:R.
TSLA.last_justification: Position performing as expected with strong momentum (MACD rising, RSI7=81.3). Maintain until profit target ($465) or stop ($452) is hit.

MSTR.invalidation_condition: If 4-hour EMA20 crosses above EMA50 or price closes above $278.00 on a 3-minute candle
MSTR.entry_justification: 4h trend bearish (EMA20=278.4 < EMA50=289.3), intraday price rejected at $274.6. MACD declining from peak; short with tight stop above recent high.
MSTR.last_justification: Short position profitable with price trending down. 4-hour EMA20 (276.8) still below EMA50 (287.8), maintaining bearish structure.

NVDA.invalidation_condition: If RSI(7) drops below 15 or price closes below $200.00 on a 3-minute candle
NVDA.entry_justification: NVDA is deeply oversold (RSI7=17.9), price near 4-hour VWAP support, MACD stabilizing after sharp drop. High reward-to-risk setup with 2.5:1 ratio.
NVDA.last_justification: NVDA is deeply oversold (RSI7=17.9), price near 4-hour VWAP support, MACD stabilizing after sharp drop. High reward-to-risk setup with 2.5:1 ratio.

PLTR.invalidation_condition: If price closes below $198.00 on a 3-minute candle or 4-hour RSI14 drops below 70
PLTR.entry_justification: PLTR shows bullish 4-hour trend (EMA20>EMA50), intraday RSI7 oversold (30.3), and price near VWAP support. Good risk-reward setup.
PLTR.last_justification: PLTR shows bullish 4-hour trend (EMA20>EMA50), intraday RSI7 oversold (30.3), and price near VWAP support. Good risk-reward setup.

TQQQ.invalidation_condition: If SPY breaks below $450 or price closes below $115.00 on a 3-minute candle
TQQQ.entry_justification: TQQQ oversold (RSI7=29.0) with bullish 4-hour trend (EMA20>EMA50). Intraday MACD stabilizing near support. Strong risk-reward potential.
TQQQ.last_justification: TQQQ oversold (RSI7=29.0) with bullish 4-hour trend (EMA20>EMA50). Intraday MACD stabilizing near support. Strong risk-reward potential.
